long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guide your ball along intricate pathways, skillfully avoiding hazards, and sprint to the finish line in this physics-based maze runner. With its simple yet captivating gameplay, Roller Baller ensures an enjoyable experience for players of all ages. ğŸ®

Controls Mastery ğŸ•¹ï¸
Hone your control skills to navigate your way to triumph:

ğŸ”¹ Arrow Keys or WASD: Take command of the ball's movements.
ğŸ”¹ Maze Navigation: Roll through elaborate mazes, evading obstacles and traps.

How to Conquer the Challenge ğŸ²
Ready to dominate the maze? Follow these steps:

1ï¸âƒ£ Choose a Level: Launch Roller Baller and select a level to take on.
2ï¸âƒ£ Maze Navigation: Utilize the arrow keys or WASD to expertly guide the ball through the maze.
3ï¸âƒ£ Avoid Obstacles: Sidestep obstacles, traps, and hazards that could impede your progress.
4ï¸âƒ£ Reach the Finish Line: Successfully navigate the maze, cross the finish line, and unlock the next level.

Explore a variety of thrilling games in the top-left menu. Enjoy your rolling adventure! ğŸŒŸ
